actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 85 of title 5, United States Code, so as to provide that unemployment compensation for those ordinarily steadily employed but who have become temporarily, involuntarily unemployed which is payable to a Federal employee for any week shall be reduced (but not below (zero) by the benefits payable to him with respect to such week under a Federal pension system.

summary.text: States that unemployment compensation, for those ordinarily steadily employed but who have become temporarily, involuntarily unemployed, which is payable to a Federal employee for any week shall be reduced (but not below zero) by the benefits payable to him with respect to such week under a Federal pension system.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 85 of title 5, United States Code, so as to provide that unemployment compensation for those ordinarily steadily employed but who have become temporarily, involuntarily unemployed which is payable to a Federal employee for any week shall be reduced (but not below (zero) by the benefits payable to him with respect to such week under a Federal pension system.
